§ 967. Repealed. Pub. L. 86–723, § 52(4), Sept. 8, 1960, 74 Stat. 847
Section, act Aug. 13, 1946, ch. 957, title V, § 577, 60 Stat. 1013, related to assignment or detail to United States as affecting personnel ceilings.
Statutory Notes and Related Subsidiaries Effective Date of RepealRepeal effective on first day of first pay period which begins more than thirty days after Sept. 8, 1960, see Pub. L. 86–723, § 56(a), Sept. 8, 1960, 74 Stat. 848.
